name: bachelorhood
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being a bachelor (= a man who is not married): He seems to have settled into married life nicely, which is surprising given his outspoken views on marriage and bachelorhood.
More examplesFewer examplesThe pair exchanged passionate letters and went on holiday together, but Brahms opted to leave her behind to pursue his career and a life of bachelorhood.There are many ways to celebrate the end of bachelorhood.When pressed about his bachelorhood, he said "I'm dating someone very special."Allan is twice divorced and now content in bachelorhood. He feared he might be doomed to lifelong bachelorhood.
